ygData.subject: Re: Arrrgh! I've had it!
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/7/99 9:31:47 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... black is the same as white.  If you are in windowed mode (the mode with all the controls with
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/7/99 9:31:47 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
JuanC@... writes:

> Sorry, black con? I don't think I've ever seen one of those. What
> does that mean? The only things I've seen were
>
black is the same as white. If you are in windowed mode (the mode with all
the controls with their scroll background etc....) all white text form the
partial windows chat box is black. So white and black are interchangeable.

> Green, green risky, blue, blue risky, white, yellow, red.

Green, green risky, blue, blue risky, white/black, yellow, red.

Is the order considering the color change in the different window modes :)

Sonoroud
